title: Virtual Assistant - Social Media & Back-End Support
job_overview:
We're looking for a talented Virtual Assistant to join our growing team! This is a dynamic role where you'll handle social media management, website support, and back-end operations across multiple businesses in our portfolio. It's a great opportunity to wear many hats and grow your skills in different areas.

Key Responsibilities

-Social Media Management
-Create, schedule, and manage content across multiple platforms
-Monitor engagement and respond to comments and messages
-Develop strategies to increase brand awareness and track performance metrics
-Customer Service & Administrative Support
-Handle payment inquiries and billing questions
-Provide timely and professional customer support
-Create graphics and visual content using Canva for social media and marketing materials
-Using Excel for reporting and tracking

Required Qualifications
-Proficiency in Canva for creating graphics, social media content, and marketing materials
-Excel skills including formulas, data analysis, and reporting
-Social media experience across major platforms (Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, TikTok)
-Proven experience in social media management and digital marketing
-Customer service experience with payment/billing systems
-Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks

Preferred Qualifications
-Previous VA or remote work experience
-Familiarity with project management tools and social media scheduling tools
-Basic understanding of digital marketing analytics
